week1.headline: Order is a beginning, not the end.
week1.body: Micro-order restores agency. We believe the deepest peace behind order is found in Jesus Christ.

week2.headline: Truth points somewhere.
week2.body: Honest thinking heals. We believe Truth with a capital T is a Person—Jesus Christ.

week3.headline: Shouldering weight reveals calling.
week3.body: Responsibility makes you stronger. We believe true calling is found under Christ's lordship.

week4.headline: Meaning through pain—what's the source?
week4.body: Endurance grows in challenge. We believe redemptive meaning is anchored in Jesus Christ.

week5.headline: Aim higher than success.
week5.body: Goals shape your life. We believe the highest aim is seeking Christ as true north.

week6.headline: Commitment needs a worthy object.
week6.body: Resolve changes futures. We believe the surest anchor for courage is Jesus Christ.

week7.headline: Joy points beyond itself.
week7.body: Desire can be trained—but its horizon remains. We believe lasting joy is found in Jesus Christ.

week8.headline: Decide your end.
week8.body: Perseverance needs a finish line. We believe the true end is found in Jesus Christ—step into Faith Mode.

highUrgeResolved.headline: You steadied the storm
highUrgeResolved.body: Would you like a peace that keeps watch over your mind? Explore Faith Mode: Light for gentle faith integration.

serviceLegacy.headline: Your values aim higher than comfort
serviceLegacy.body: Explore the calling that outlasts you. Try Faith Mode: Light to discover purpose beyond yourself.
